text: This grading scheme is used at Taylor's University for Foundation, Diploma, Advanced Diploma and Bachelor's Degree Letter Marks Quality Points A 80-100 4 A- 75-79 3.67 B+ 70-74 3.33 B 65-69 3 B- 60-64 2.67 c+ 55-59 2.33 c 50-54 2 D+ 47-49 1.67 D 44-46 1.33 D- 40-43 1 F 0-39 0 Information Source: Taylor's University
